titles: To the right honourable the Lords now assembled in Parliament. The humble petition of the high-sheriff, knights, esquiors, gentlemen, ministers, freeholders, and other the inhabitants of the county of Berks.
publisher: March 5. London, Printed by Iohn Raworth,
notes: Also includes: To the honourable knights, citizens, and burgesses of the House of Commons now assembled in Parliament. The humble petition of the high-sheriff, knights, esquiors, gentlemen, ministers, freeholders, and other the inhabitants of the county of Berks.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: England and Wales. --  Parliament. --  Early works to 1800.
